title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - the perfect travel companion for your next adventure! This lightweight hardside suitcase is designed with your convenience and style in mind.

With its 21" carry-on size, this underseat luggage is compact and fits easily in most airline overhead compartments. It comes in a variety of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, allowing you to choose the one that suits your personal style.

Made from durable ABS hard shell material and supported by a strong steel rod, this suitcase is built to last. It offers a spacious capacity of 33L, providing ample room for your belongings. The dimensions of 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H) ensure that you can pack everything you need for a 1-3 day trip.

The Travelhouse Underseat Luggage features 360-degree silent double spinner wheels, allowing for smooth and effortless maneuverability. You can easily glide through crowded airports and busy streets with ease. The silent spinner wheels ensure a noise-free travel experience.

For added security, this suitcase comes with a TSA lock, keeping your belongings safe and giving you peace of mind. The interior of the suitcase is designed with convenience in mind. It features a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to keep your items organized and secure. The full-capacity design maximizes packing efficiency, allowing you to make the most of the available space.

The lightweight design of this suitcase, weighing only 5.62lb, makes it easy to carry and maneuver. Its high durability and scratch resistance ensure that it can withstand the rigors of travel, ensuring that it will be your trusted companion for many adventures to come.

The Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" also features a TPR soft handle with adjustable heights, providing comfort and ease of use. The handle is made from stainless steel, ensuring its durability.

Upgrade your travel experience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20". Choose from a range of vibrant colors and enjoy the convenience and style that this suitcase has to offer. Get ready to embark on your next adventure in style and comfort!

Don't miss out on this must-have travel essential! Upgrade your travel experience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20". Get yours today and embark on your next adventure in style and convenience.
